name: Squeak!
description:
Like all mice, you got lost in the sky with only your trusty umbrella!

Customize ur mouse, Collect Coins & Cheese - and avoid dangers!

Squeak! is small project of mine that took about 12 days to make.

I will create a new game every 1-2 weeks!

Have Fun & Thanks for Playing!

I will come back and fix any issues.

known issues; 

full screen error at launch.

private games not always private.

________________________

I am  "just a guy in a bedroom"  making somewhat shitty games while i learn the process! i've been using unity for 2-3 years now and make all my own assets.

I've recently started with multiplayer / coop games and for now i'm trying to make small games that take me a week or two!

If you have any questions feel free to contact me at: 

poemagames.contact@gmail.com
